Paragraph: The exercise - isoproterenol ( E - 1 ) and exercise control ( EC ) groups exercised daily for thirty days on a treadmill at 1 mph , 2 % grade while animals of the sedentary - isoproterenol ( S - I ) group remained sedentary .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities in the paragraph you provided:

| Disease |
| --- |
| isoproterenol (E-1) |
| exercise control (EC) |
| sedentary - isoproterenol (S-I) |

Note that "isoproterenol (E-1)" and "sedentary - isoproterenol (S-I)" are both referred to as "disease" entities in the paragraph, even though they are not actually diseases. They are being used as experimental conditions in the study described in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Disease" entities in the paragraph you provided, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

The other mentioned entities, "exercise control (EC)" and "sedentary - isoproterenol (S-I)", do not clearly refer to diseases and were therefore excluded from the table.
